name: Coitus Cupid
body:
### Welcome to the GitHub page for Coitus Cupid.
Coitus Cupid is a proof-of-concept dating website which uses the latest and greatest web technologies.  Written in Rails 3.2 and Ruby 1.9.3, we aim to provide a reference quality web application which is fully regression tested, secure and fast. Please browse the [issues tracker](https://github.com/hale/off-the-rails/issues) for current progress and milestones.

### Usage
The code is deployed and available at http://coitusproject.herokuapp.com/.  Please note that as of April 2012, the site is currently still in development and as such things may break or become unusable.

### Support or Contact
If you have any questions or would like to contribute, please contact Philip Hale (@hale).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
